eu_initiatives:
All the legislation related with agrochemicals and fertilizers 
that might affect trade.We are interested en the EU legislation, and the implication, for example the Directive 1109/2009 and 396/2005. Both directive a nd the implementation of such kind of legislation on Plant Protection Products are our main issue.
organisation_name: Cámara de la Industria Argentina de Fertilizantes y Agroquímicos (CIAFA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: All the communications activities and publications related with agrochemicals and fertilizers. We are interested in the legislation that influence the international trade. Any communication of policy implementation of directives concerning Plant Protection Products and MRL are of our interest.
goals__remit: We are a Chamber of Industry Fertilizers & Agricultural Chemicals.
